Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select which mode to use, this is dependant on which mod you're using.
- Lite options can be used with LAW: Extreme Fury [Lite],
Or just be used by themselves.
- Extreme Fury requires:
LAW: Extreme Fury.
Or
LAW: Extreme Fury [Definitive Edition].
This will apply to all styles.

Elements.Name: DependsCount
Description: Select whether to enable automatic enabling of mods.
When configured, this will automatically enable the mod set below.
Disable this if you wish to use this mod with non Like a Werehog mods.
